name: Spotlight X: Room Escape
description:
Spotlight game series is coming back with new story twists and parallel stories.

Game is a fascinating story-based quest that will push your brain to think logically and efficiently in order to solve the interesting puzzles and challenging riddles within the game!

Our hero finds himself locked up in an unfamiliar place. He can't remember who he is, but he knows certain that he needs to escape the room alive!

Only the smartest shall prevail and survive.
The question now is - can you pass all levels and escape?
